name: Antiche Mura Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautifully clean, very comfortable, staff polite and helpful, all made for a great base for our holiday. You have to be mindful of the fact that Sorrento is quite a hilly resort, and some hotels require quite a climb to get to. Not with the Antiche Mura though, it is 5 minutes stroll from the main square, the Piazza Tasso.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel in top location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are kept spotlessly clean, towels and linen changed daily
reviews.title: Great Honeymoon, great place hotel and staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel has buffet breakfasts with hot and cold fare, fresh fruit, cakes, croissants, meats etc etc
reviews.title: Believe the excellent reviews!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent 4 nights in this hotel just this week and had a blast. We were on our honeymoon and really liked the place. Very well located, very clean. The people were extremely nice and all spoke english which was a great advantage. We even had some sparkling wine waiting in the room, brilliant.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was really good, cleaned twice a day (first time I saw that, but very appreciated), they had the best buffet breakfast. With all you can imagine on it, fresh fruit from their own garden to make juice.
reviews.title: A great place to stay in Sorrento

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the place to stay in Sorrento! Our beautiful room, the gorgeous breakfast, the pool area surrounded by lemon trees, and the perfect location made this a great way to experience Sorrento. It was wonderful to sit outside by the pool and enjoy lunch after the train ride from Rome. Because of the central location, we were able to take the bus to Positano and spend the afternoon there, and then return to a good dinner and an evening shopping in Sorrento.
reviews.title: A GREAT place to experience Sorrento!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were comfortable, the staff very helpful, and the breakfast was delicious. After a day touring Pompeii, the pool was a very refreshing treat! Thanks Antiche Mura for a great time in Sorrento!
reviews.title: Friendliest staff in Sorrento

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our week's stay was superb - thanks to the friendly, helpful staff at Antiche Mura. Maria Laura took a great deal of time and care with us and Mario was polite, knowledgeable and understanding. Aldo and Luigi also provided excellent customer service. Michelle was a first-class hostess at breakfast and we greatly enjoyed Mario's homemade frozen lemonade and cheerfulness around the pool.
reviews.title: The most amazing day of my life. Attention to detail was exquisite.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The location of the villa for the wedding was truly breathtaking and it was so amazing to watch everyone's faces as they walked into the villa and saw the view.
reviews.title: Very good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was exquisite both at the hotel and the villa and all our guests were extremely happy. Michele (the organiser) paid real attention to detail in every aspect and fulfilled my every wish! It was really nice to actually have him there on the day; this was another touch that made it extra special. He organised everything from flowers, legal documents, music, hair, and flowers. All were absolutely perfect! Any doubts I had were wiped away the moment I met Michele and sampled the menu. Once again, nothing can prepare you for how beautiful the villa really was.
reviews.title: A serene, well appointed hotel in the heart of Sorrento with excellent service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the complimentary champagne welcome, to help with times for boat trips and phone calls, this hotel was "tops". The room, the breakfast, the grounds and the staff all helped to make our experience at the Hotel Antiche Mura excellent. It's close proximity to Piazza Tasso, the train and bus station and excellent restaurants also added to our vacation experience. We would higly recommend this hotel to anyone. Enjoying the beautiful pool area was a wonderful way to relax after a hectic day of sight seeing. But most of all, it was the pleasant and very accommodating staff that made our time at this hotel so comfortable and enjoyable.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I am writing this review ten months after staying at this hotel because I find it notable that I continue to think about what a wonderful experience it was. The hotel is located in the heart of Sorrento. Everything you could ask for in a hotel is offered at Antiche Mura. The breakfast was out of this world. The staff was perfect and the grounds are simply lovely. My memories of lingering underneath the lemon trees by the pool will continue to linger in my mind for a long time to come and I hope to revisit as soon as possible.
reviews.title: It's been awhile, but I still think if this place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was nice and quiet.
reviews.title: Excellent, but wifi signal weak and slow even in common area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only downside to this hotel was that the wifi in the common area was weak and slow.
reviews.title: Loved This Hotel,Staff is Second to None!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Hotel staff was helpful and pleasant.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in the heart of everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently spent 9 days at the Antiche Mura in Sorrento and loved it. The main reason...THE STAFF. We looked forward to Mario's smiling face each day at the pool, Tony at the Lobby/pool bar, Michelle at the breakfast diningroom, and last but certainly not least....Luigi at the front desk. The recommendations for restaurants and sight-seeing and just general conversation, we valued. We really felt like family and were sorry to leave. The hotel itself is very nice, and the beautiful pool surrounded by lemon and orange trees, is a welcomed sight after a day out and about Sorrento. The hotel does not have a view of the sea but is in a great location, close to everything. The only feedback I have for the hotel is that they should replace the mattresses on the beds. We found them uncomfortable. It truly is the people you have working at the hotel that make it. Treasure them!!
reviews.title: Great Staff, Great Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This is a great place to stay in Sorrento. Great location, nice space, and wonderful staff!
reviews.title: Felt like a vacation home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool is surrounded by lemon trees and has an oasis like feel to it. The rooms are spacious, very clean and quiet. The breakfeast (which is included) is so delicious! A wide variety of items to choose from! The staff at this hotel are so nice, and very helpful!
reviews.title: Perfect spot if you're staying in Sorrento

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: I would absolutely stay here again!
reviews.title: Wonderful stay and fantastic staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Something to consider: If you hire a driver from the hotel to take you up and down the Amalfi coast, it is best to hammer out the details before you leave. Set a time of when you want to be back at the hotel, and agree to pay only that price. The drivers are paid by the hour.
reviews.title: high quality hotel with staff to match, ideal location

description: Antiche Mura Hotel has a wonderful position in the heart of Sorrento, in the main square Piazza Tasso. It is an ideal base for exploring Sorrento and its beautiful surroundings like Capri, Positano, Amalfi, Ravello, etc. This newly renovated hotel combines elegance, style and modern comforts (Like Free Wi-Fi) able to satisfy guests with the highest expectations. At the same time , you will be able to experience centuries of history.
